input: joke: Why do cows wear bells? Because their horns don't work.
validityText:
The provided input is a joke: "Why do cows wear bells? Because their horns don't work." According to the input specification, the input is supposed to be a joke, which can be a sentence or a set of sentences. This is indeed a joke as it follows a typical question-answer format, utilizing a play on words ("horns" being interpreted in a musical sense versus the natural cow horns, creating humor). The specification states that there are no restrictions on the content of the joke, as humor is subjective, and no predefined length is required as long as it is coherent enough to be categorized.

There are no violations of the input specification in the provided input. It directly fits the definition of a joke, thus complying with the input specification.

OK
